headline.main: DUQUESNE DISPLAYS HATRED OF BRITISH; Clashes With Cross-Examiner, Warned by Spy Trial Judge

lead_paragraph: The Anglophobia that Frederick Joubert Duquesne has been credited with cherishing during most of his adult life flared into the open yesterday at the Brooklyn espionage trial, as the 63-year-old native of South Africa spent his third day on the witness stand, mainly under the cross-examination of United States Attorney Harold M. Kennedy.
